channel.title: Bridging Realities with WebXR and Web Bluetooth on heapcon ⬣ a new conference by heapspace
channel.description: Recent content in Bridging Realities with WebXR and Web Bluetooth on heapcon ⬣ a new conference by heapspace

item.title: Peter O'Shaughnessy
item.description: Peter is a developer advocate in Samsung’s mobile web browser (Samsung Internet) team. He enjoys helping web developers to make the most of the web platform, especially up-and-coming Web APIs. In recent months he has been exploring and sharing about PWAs, Web Payments, WebXR and Web Bluetooth. He has been a developer since 2003, previously working at a “future technologies” lab at an education company and as a tech lead at a national newspaper and two web development agencies.
